title: Business site
summary: A fictional responsive website built with HTML, CSS & JavaScript. Includes hero video, card-based layout, signup form, and interactive hamburger menu. No backend connection — focus on responsive UI and clean code.

title: Recipe library
summary: Interactive recipe app with search, filter and sort. Uses Spoonacular API. Data normalized and cached in localStorage.

image.alt: pictures of food recipes and filtering options

title: Weather app – SMHI API
summary: Responsive weather app with current conditions and 5-day forecast for Swedish cities.
